hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah said; The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) was asked shout the validity of prayer in a single garment. The prophet (ﷺ) said:Does every one of you has two garment?

chapter.ara-name: باب جِمَاعِ أَثْوَابِ مَا يُصَلَّى فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: The Types Of Clothes In Which It Is Permissible To Pray
